description: This file is a React component for the index route of a Remix web application. It renders a landing page with header, logo images, and a list of resource links, including inline SVG icons. It also defines a meta function for setting page metadata.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Defines metadata for the page, returning title and description tags.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: React component rendering the main index page with header, logo, and resource links.
